title: Australia
summary: Australia is a country in Australia and New Zealand. The capital is Canberra. Population: 27.5 million. Area: 7,692,024 km².

images.alt: The flag of Australia has a dark blue field. It features the flag of the United Kingdom — the Union Jack — in the canton, beneath which is a large white seven-pointed star. A representation of the Southern Cross constellation, made up of one small five-pointed and four larger seven-pointed white stars, is situated on the fly side of the field.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
